program main

implicit none

integer :: N, M, i, x, y, count1, prime_num
logical :: red(100000) ! assuming N up to 1e5, but maybe better to read N first
integer :: num(100000)
character(len=20) :: s_prime
logical :: hasA, hasB

!
children.label: code_analysis

integer, allocatable :: num(:)

children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
N, M

allocate(num(N), red(N)) num = 1
red = .false.
red(1) = .true. do i = 1, M
   read(*,*)
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
x, y
   call move_box(x, y, num, red)
end do

count1 = count(red)

deallocate(num, red)

! Now process second part

x = count1

if (x /=2 .and. mod(x,2) ==0) then
   x = x +1
end if

prime_num = x

do while (.true.)
   logical :: is_prime = .true. integer :: sqrt_x = int(sqrt(real(prime_num))) if (prime_num ==1) then
      is_prime = .false.
   else if (prime_num ==2) then
      is_prime = .true.
   else
      do i=3, sqrt_x, 2
         if (mod(prime_num, i) ==0) then
            is_prime = .false. exit
         end if
      end do
   end if
   if (is_prime) exit
   prime_num = prime_num +2
end do

! Now third part: convert prime_num to string and check for A and B

write(s_prime, '(i0)') prime_num

hasA = .false. hasB = .false. do i=1, len_trim(s_prime)
   if (s_prime(i:i) == 'A') then
      hasA = .true.
   else if (s_prime(i:i) == 'B') then
      hasB = .true.
   end if
end do

if (hasA .and.
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
hasB) then
   print *, 'Yes'
else
   print *, 'No'
end if

contains

subroutine move_box(x, y, num, red)
   integer, intent(in) :: x, y
   integer, intent(inout) :: num(:)
   logical, intent(inout) :: red(:)
   integer :: current_num

   current_num = num(x)
   if (current_num ==0) return

   if (current_num ==1) then
      num(x) =0
      num(y) = num(y) +1
      if (red(x)) then
         red(y) = .true. end if
      red(x) = .false.
   else
      num(x) = num(x) -1
      num(y) = num(y) +1
      if (red(x)) then
         red(y) = .true.
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
end if
   end if
end subroutine move_box

end program main

implicit none

integer :: N, M, i, x, y, count1, prime_num

   call move_box(x, y, num, red)
end do

! Now process second part

   x = x +1
end if

prime_num = x

do while (.true.)
   logical :: is_prime = .true.
   integer :: sqrt_x = int(sqrt(real(prime_num)))
   if (prime_num ==1) then
      is_prime = .false.
   else if (prime_num ==2) then

hasB = .false.

      hasA = .true.
   else if (s_prime(i:i) == 'B') then
      hasB = .true.
   end if
end do

if (hasA .and. hasB) then
   print *, 'Yes'
else
   print *, 'No'
end if

contains

subroutine move_box(x, y, num, red)
   integer, intent(in) :: x, y
   integer, intent(inout) :: num(:)
   logical, intent(inout) :: red(:)
   integer :: current_num

   current_num = num(x)
   if (current_num ==0) return

   if (current_num ==1) then
      num(x) =0
      num(y) = num(y) +1
      if (red(x)) then
         red(y) = .true.
      end if
      red(x) = .false.
   else
      num(x) = num(x) -1
      num(y) = num(y) +1
      if (red(x)) then
         red(y) = .true.
      end if
   end if
end subroutine move_box

end program main
